sentences.sContent: It’s a matter of great political sensitivity.
sentences.sCn: 这件事在政治上非常敏感。

sentences.sContent: The sensitivity of the detector can be increased.
sentences.sCn: 这种探测器的灵敏度还可以提高。

sentences.sContent: ...Ted Hughes had an acute sensitivity to the way in which constraints on self-expression...

trans.tranOther: when a situation or subject needs to be dealt with carefully because it is secret or may offend people
